sentences.sContent: If we do it ourselves, only cheap energy from hydropower will do.
sentences.sContent_eng: If we do it ourselves, only cheap energy from hydropower will do.
sentences.sCn: 如果靠自力更生，只有靠水电站带来的廉价能源了。

sentences.sContent: Developing hydropower more quickly would allow for increasing the renewable energy target above the envisaged government target without increasing the incremental cost of the program.
sentences.sContent_eng: Developing hydropower more quickly would allow for increasing the renewable energy target above the envisaged government target without increasing the incremental cost of the program.
sentences.sCn: 加快发展水电可以在不增加整个可再生能源开发方案总成本的同时，实现可再生能源发展的新目标。

phrases.pCn: 水利水电工程；水力工程学；水利工程
